channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for ID
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for ID

item.title: Report E-2024080099
item.description:
Report E-2024080099

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-08T15:13:41+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-02
  • City: MERIDIAN
  • State: ID
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: XPO
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: It was reported that approximately 0.5-gallon of Extreme Floor Stripper, which released from one (1) 1-gallon plastic jug due to the container being crushed by other freight. ERTS reviewed the SDS with the terminal who felt comfortable cleaning the release with the available PPE onsite.
